member.summary: Removes the user from rhino security. This does NOT delete the user itself, merely reset all the information that rhino security knows about it. It also allows it to be removed by external API without violating FK constraints

member.summary: Serves as a hash function for a particular type. is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
